## Source: ossf-package-analysis (afbe2fb4071ec030a6a51319f5f0b9d45664bf8caba681cfac58bb60bd001cf0)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'ringcentral-google-drive-notification-add-in' @ 2.2.2 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
